summary: This bill, the ATF Data and Anti-Trafficking Accountability Act (ATF DATA Act), mandates the Attorney General, through the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF), to publish detailed data sets regarding firearm trace data. This includes aggregated trace data, data on source licensees, analysis of firearm trafficking patterns, and information on privately made firearms.  The goal is to improve transparency and accountability related to firearms.
